history.p: The melody was composed as part of NIelsen's contribution to Nye Melodier til Johan Borups Dansk Sangbog (CNW Coll. 21). The idea of setting music to the text apparently came from Adolf Riis-Magnussen, the editor of the songbook, who ended up appreciating the melody. According to a letter to his family, also Nielsen was very satisfied with it.

bibl.author: Sten Høgel
Torben Schousboe
bibl.title: I kølende skygger – en ukendt romance af Carl Nielsen
Musik og forskning

history.p: This version for voice and piano was probably made shortly after the single-line melody.
Probably in 1929, Nielsen made a version for piano.

relation.label: Bidrag til "Nye Melodier til Johan Borups Dansk Sangbog"
